author: Linus Tech Tips
description:
Go to https://iamveryshort.com to reserve your Switch2 Killswitch

We got details on the hardware itself, new online features and most importantly -  a LOT of GAMES. Zelda, Mario Kart, Kirby, Elden Ring, Cyberpunk and SO MANY MORE HOLY SMOKES THERE ARE SO MANY GAMES!
